colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (CES PA 'DI CHOS DRUG GI YIG CHA RNYING PA RNAMS SOR BZHAG ,RANG NYID NYAMS SU BLANG BA'I PHYIR DANG, ,GZHAN YANG BKA' BRGYUD 'DI NYID KYI LAM SROL 'DZIN PAR 'DOD PA GANG DAG GI DON DU, SH'AKYA'I @007A *, ,DGE SLONG THABS LAM 'DI NYID CUNG ZAD NYAMS SU LEN PA DHARMA K'IRTIS ZLA DGON DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'PHA YI KHYAD CHOS YID BZHIN NOR BU 'DI, ,NGO MTSAR MI 'DZAD PAR DU LEGS BSKRUN DGE ,MA GYUR 'GRO BA SEMS CAN MA LUS PA, ,SKU BZHI'I GO 'PHANG MYUR THOB RGYUR GYUR CIG ,SARBA MANGGA LAm,, ,,)
